projects.title: Guild Wars 2 Brasil
projects.description: It's the unofficial community forum of the game Guild Wars 2 in Brazil. The community exists since 2011 and we had three websites since that. This last one focus on the community itself, and has only the forum and the Facebook fanpage. The forum is built in top of my personal fork named Nodeclube. In the fork I implemented new features like, a new template, signs support, Youtube thumbnails, a twitch.tv streaming module and portuguese translation. The forum uses NodeJS, Express, Jade and Less(for templating) and MongoDB. I implemented continuous integration through the RedHat OpenShift cloud servers.

projects.title: ASO-Online
description: It's a still in development medical manager. It works by connecting people, companies and hospitals to offer medical services.
Uses CakePHP and MySQL on backend
Uses gulp and many gulp plugins (even self made plugins) to offer full tooling and integration with GitHub, Codeship and Google App Engine
It's deployed fully on Google App Engine PHP runtime
Uses Bootstrap, jQuery, and Datatables on frontend
